attributes.action: Stop purchase of 4,000 BMW cars for Olympic VIP's
attributes.additional_details:
The Government are purchasing 4,000 made in Germany BMW cars of 3 and 5 Series at an estimated cost of £150million-this is our money and we would like a say in the matter.
What is wrong with either British made cars or foreign cars manufactured in this Country and giving work to thousands who contribute through taxes to this Governments coffers.
Stop this purchase.

rejection.details: This is a matter for LOCOG.
